task_description: Facing the building to your North (approx. 14°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to see the full facade (base to roofline) of the north-facing main building to estimate its height, so I should tilt upward first.
With the camera pitched up, the roofline is visible enough to approximate the number of floors and convert to meters, so I can provide an estimate now.
